```{r}
#/label: setup
#|echo: FALSE
library(tidyverse)
library(mosaic)
library(skimr) 
library(visdat) 
library(naniar)
library(janitor)
library(dbplyr)
library(tinytable)
```

```{r}
fastfood <- readr::read_csv("https://vincentarelbundock.github.io/Rdatasets/csv/openintro/fastfood.csv")
```

```{r}
 base::names(fastfood)
 dplyr::glimpse(fastfood)
 base::dim(fastfood)
  utils::str(fastfood)
```
```{r}
 visdat::vis_dat(fastfood)
 visdat::vis_miss(fastfood)
```
```{r}
fastfood_modified <- fastfood
tidyr::drop_na(fastfood_modified)
fastfood_modified
```
## Remove Coloumns Entirely

```{r}
fastfood_modified2 <- fastfood %>% 
select(-c(vit_a))
fastfood_modified2
```
##Mutate data
```{r}
fastfood_modified3 <- fastfood %>%
  mutate(
    restaurant = as.factor(restaurant),
    salad = as.factor(salad),
  ) %>% 
  dplyr::relocate(where(is.factor), .after = rownames)
fastfood_modified3
tt(fastfood_modified3)
```
